/hr/ghcr.io-prometheus-community-charts-.title: snmp-exporter-dell-idrac helm release
/hr/ghcr.io-prometheus-community-charts-.name: snmp-exporter-dell-idrac
/hr/ghcr.io-prometheus-community-charts-.doc:
To monitor Dell iDRAC devices with Prometheus, you can use the SNMP Exporter and use it with the snmp.yml configuration file.

Below you can find other users from our community that have already configured the SNMP Exporter for Dell iDRAC devices. Click on their repository links to see their helm release and in the same directory you should find a config map with the snmp.yml configuration file.

0:
auth:
  - user: scans
    group: scans
    uid: 568
    gid: 568
    password: scans
global:
  - "force user = scans"
  - "force group = scans"
  - "create mask = 0644"
  - "directory mask = 0755"
share:
  - name: Scans
    path: /share1
    browsable: yes
    readonly: no
    guestok: no
    comment: "Printer scans"
    veto: yes
host=crtsh-postgres port=5432 dbname=certwatch user=certwatch password=certwatch sslmode=disable

# Default DB connection settings
# conninfo to be supplied via the "-conninfo" command-line parameter.
connopen = 2
connidle = 2
connlife = "10m"

# Default workload settings
interval = "30s"
batch = 20
concurrent = 2

# Other default settings
httptimeout = "30s"
host=crtsh-postgres port=5432 dbname=certwatch user=certwatch password=certwatch sslmode=disable

# Default DB connection settings
# conninfo to be supplied via the "-conninfo" command-line parameter.
connopen = 2
connidle = 2
connlife = "10m"

# Default workload settings
interval = "30s"
batch = 500
concurrent = 50

# Other default settings
httptimeout = "30s"
host=crtsh-postgres port=5432 dbname=certwatch user=certwatch password=certwatch sslmode=disable

# Default DB connection settings
# conninfo to be supplied via the "-conninfo" command-line parameter.
connopen = 2
connidle = 2
connlife = "10m"

# Default workload settings
interval = "30s"
batch = 500
concurrent = 50

# Other default settings
httptimeout = "30s"

---
modules:
  default:
    metrics:
    - name: mcc
      path: "{ .Aggregated_PerSecondStats.Samples }"
      help: Per-second stats aggregated over a minute
      labels:
        environment: test

routers:
- name: Oracle Cloud, Aus East
  network:
    name: oracle-aue
    display_name: oracle-aue
  nos: linux
  address: localhost
  port: 2222
  credential:
    username: ubuntu
    password: ubuntu
  vrfs:
  - name: global
    default: true
    ipv4:
      source_address: 192.0.2.1
    ipv6:
      source_address: 2001:db8::1
